name: PostCollapse
description: PostCollapse is a survival simulation game set after the collapse of civilization. Gather items from the ruins, construct tools, grow your own food, go fishing and hunting. Single player only. No Zombies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or newer Processor: Intel Celeron, Athlon Sempron oder better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 capable video card with 512 MB or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: any
